name: FNF Alphabet Lore Funkin
description: Alphabet Lore is available in FNF mod. This Friday night, would you like to rap battle vs F - an alphabet lore which get lost in funkin world with many other letters? Letter this time is our main antagonist subtituting for BF and GF to rap battle all FNF enemies. Letter is not just letter. Now, they are able to sing. Join us in this irresistible rap carnival! HOW TO PLAY? - Make arrows perfectly match. - Beat all enemies (Doors monster, Indie cross, .EXE), climb to the top rank! FUNKIN FEATURE - Arrows fall follow funkin melody - Full mods Full enemies as you expected (Suicide mouse, Hypno Lullaby, PE and etc) - Fantastic background with great sound effects - Always save your funkin journey while you exit the game - Not require starting a new mode of play - Be updated frequently!
